ch0079_09_miniskirt/2701_0701_01_10:
It is I, the Masked Lass, the most beautiful woman
in all of Team Break!
ch0079_09_miniskirt/2701_0701_02_10: What did you think? That was pretty cool, right?
ch0079_09_miniskirt/2701_0701_03_10:
I think I’m going to make that my catchphrase from
now on!
ch0079_09_miniskirt/2701_0701_04_10:
But which pose do you think I should use?
I’m having trouble deciding because they’re all
so good!
